mathphrase.phrase: If one of the sources that make up a SOLOR concept, changes the meaning of their concept, the SOLOR concept will be retired. A replacement concept may possibly be created.

editorial-rule.title: No explicit or implied negation in morphology descriptions

mathphrase.phrase: Negation is not supported by the EL++ profile, and so negation is not part of the logical definition of a morphology concept, and therefore cannot be part of the description of the concept, even if the concept is declared as primitive.
